subject: Hockey, Ice
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the Devils, could complete a deal by the end of next month to erase most of the team’s debt and bring in new minority owners.
snippet: Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the Devils, could complete a deal by the end of next month to erase most of the team’s debt and bring in new minority owners.
